availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, attorney and attorney general. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet Rodman. Father of John Rodman, Thomas Rodman, Russell Rodman, Ann E. Rodman, Susan Rodman, Hugh Rodman, and William Rodman. Attorney in Frankfort in 1860. Attorney general of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1865 to 1875.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 109.

Find A Grave, "John Rodman (1820-1886)," Memorial #59771654, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59771654 (accessed April 5, 2018).
